theme: The setting is the world of the book series "Wings of Fire." The main characters are dragonets and dragons from tribes like MudWings, SeaWings, SkyWings, IceWings, NightWings, and more. Scenes may take place in places such as Pyrrhia, Pantala, or Jade Mountain Academy. Dragonets like Clay, Tsunami, Glory, Starflight, Sunny, Peril, Moonwatcher, Winter, and others may sometimes be mentioned. These characters and places do not need to appear in every sentence.
title: Avery's KPop Vocab - Section {section}
